00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "doc.h"
00009 
00010 using namespace std;
00011 
00012 void generateSQL(MavenCompiler* c) {
00013         // handles
00014         ofstream sql;
00015         sql.open("docs.sql");
00016         
00017         // create tables
00018         sql << "drop table if exists options;" << endl;
00019         sql << "create table options (" << endl
00020         << "name varchar(255) not null primary key," << endl
00021         << "value varchar(255));" << endl << endl;
00022         
00023         sql << "drop table if exists namespaces;" << endl;
00024         sql << "create table namespaces (" << endl
00025         << "id int not null primary key," << endl
00026         << "doc text," << endl
00027         << "namespaceName varchar(255)" << endl
00028         << ");" << endl << endl;
00029         
00030         sql << "drop table if exists classes;" << endl;
00031         sql << "create table classes (" << endl
00032         << "id int not null primary key," << endl
00033         << "pid int not null," << endl
00034         << "lineNumber int," << endl
00035         << "doc text," << endl
00036         << "className varchar(255)," << endl
00037         << "isAbstract boolean not null default 0," << endl
00038         << "isFinal boolean not null default 0," << endl
00039         << "extendsClasses varchar(255)" << endl
00040         << ");" << endl << endl;
00041         
00042         sql << "drop table if exists variables;" << endl;
00043         sql << "create table variables (" << endl
00044         << "id int not null primary key," << endl
00045         << "pid int not null," << endl
00046         << "lineNumber int," << endl
00047         << "doc text," << endl
00048         << "type varchar(255)," << endl
00049         << "variableName varchar(255)," << endl
00050         << "isPublic boolean not null default 0," << endl
00051         << "isStatic boolean not null default 0" << endl
00052         << ");" << endl << endl;
00053         
00054         sql << "drop table if exists functions;" << endl;
00055         sql << "create table functions (" << endl
00056         << "id int not null primary key," << endl
00057         << "pid int not null," << endl
00058         << "lineNumber int," << endl
00059         << "doc text," << endl
00060         << "returnType varchar(255)," << endl
00061         << "functionName varchar(255)," << endl
00062         << "arguments text," << endl
00063         << "isPublic boolean not null default 0," << endl
00064         << "isStatic boolean not null default 0," << endl
00065         << "isExternal boolean not null default 0," << endl
00066         << "alias varchar(255)," << endl
00067         << "isAliasSystem boolean not null default 0" << endl
00068         << ");" << endl << endl;
00069         
00070         // some default records
00071         sql << "insert into options (name, value) values ('version', '1.0');" << endl << endl;
00072         
00073         // namespaces
00074         int globalID = 1;
00075         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00076                 int namespaceID = globalID++;
00077                 sql
00078                 << "insert into namespaces (id, doc, namespaceName) values ("
00079                 << namespaceID << ","
00080                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).doc.body) << ","
00081                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).name) << ");" << endl;
00082                 
00083                 for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->length(); ++j) {
00084                         int classID = globalID++;
00085                         sql
00086                         << "insert into classes (id, pid, lineNumber, doc, className, isAbstract, isFinal, extendsClasses) values ("
00087                         << classID << ","
00088                         << namespaceID << ","
00089                         << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->line << ","
00090                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->doc.body) << ","
00091                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->name) << ","
00092                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->isAbstract) << ","
00093                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->isFinal) << ","
00094                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->extends)
00095                         << ");" << endl;
00096                         
00097                         // variables
00098                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->length(); ++k) {
00099                                 sql << "insert into variables (id, pid, lineNumber, doc, type, variableName, isPublic, isStatic) values ("
00100                                 << globalID++ << ","
00101                                 << classID << ","
00102                                 << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).atLine << ","
00103                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).doc.body) << ","
00104                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).type) << ","
00105                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).name) << ","
00106                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).isPublic) << ","
00107                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).isStatic)
00108                                 << ");" << endl;
00109                         }
00110                         
00111                         // functions
00112                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->length(); ++k) {
00113                                 sql << "insert into functions (id, pid, lineNumber, doc, returnType, functionName, isPublic, isStatic, isExternal, alias, isAliasSystem, arguments) values ("
00114                                 << globalID++ << ","
00115                                 << classID << ","
00116                                 << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).atLine << ","
00117                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).doc.body) << ","
00118                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).returnType) << ","
00119                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).name) << ","
00120                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isPublic) << ","
00121                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isStatic) << ","
00122                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isExternal) << ","
00123                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).alias) << ","
00124                                 << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).alias_system) << ",";
00125                                 
00126                                 string arguments = "";
00127                                 for(int l = 0; l < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args.length(); ++l) {
00128                                         if(l) arguments += ", ";
00129                                         arguments += c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args[l].type + " "
00130                                         + c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args[l].name;
00131                                 }
00132                                 sql << sqlSafe(arguments)
00133                                 << ");" << endl;
00134                         }
00135                 }
00136         }
00137 }
